title: How to quickly take notes on the Galaxy S22 Ultra using the included S Pen
content:
With the Galaxy S22 series launch earlier this year, Samsung finally put its popular Galaxy Note lineup to rest. That’s because the company has included all of the unique software and hardware features from the Galaxy Note lineup in the new Galaxy S22 Ultra. The top-of-the-line flagship is a spiritual successor to the Galaxy Note

The post How to quickly take notes on the Galaxy S22 Ultra using the included S Pen appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Just got yourself a new Galaxy S22 Ultra? Here's how to quickly take notes on the device using the built-in S Pen.
